field.name: Source, Latitude
field.description: Latitude of the source, in degrees. Unit must be `°`.

field.name: Source, Longitude
field.description: Longitude of the source, in degrees. Unit must be `°`.

field.name: Waypoint %1%, Latitude
field.description: Latitude of the Waypoint %1%, in degrees. Unit must be `°`.

field.name: Waypoint %1%, Longitude
field.description: Longitude of the Waypoint %1%, in degrees. Unit must be `°`.

field.name: Destination, Latitude
field.description: Latitude of the destination, in degrees. Unit must be `°`.

field.name: Destination, Longitude
field.description: Longitude of the destination, in degrees. Unit must be `°`.

parameter.name: Remove Waypoint
parameter.description: Removes a waypoint from the route.

parameter.name: Remove Source
parameter.description: If true, removes the source information from the route.

parameter.name: Remove Destination
parameter.description: If true, removes the destination information from the route.

parameter.name: Point Latitude
parameter.description: Latitude of the point, in degrees.

parameter.name: Point Longitude
parameter.description: Longitude of the point, in degrees.

parameter.name: Point Altitude
parameter.description: Altitude of the point, using the same unit as that provided by the altitude fields.

parameter.name: Add Point
parameter.description: Adds the current point to the route, if parameters have been set correctly. After adding the point to the list, all parameters for the current item are cleared. Possible values are: `Source`, `Destination`, `Waypoint`.

parameter.name: Clear Points
parameter.description: If true, removes all waypoints as well as the source and the destination from the route.
